cast.name: 格雷格·格拉西亚 Gregory Thomas Garcia

this_title: Fearless, the Life Story of Cloris Leachman
introduction: A captivating film that delves into the extraordinary life of Cloris Leachman--one of the most acclaimed female performers in history. A wife, mother, actress, comedian, she had the ability to stop a room with her blunt delivery. Her professionalize life could not have been more rewarding while her personal life was a mixture of chaos, drama and anything but normal. With twenty-seven interviews including her four adult children and Hollywood's most prominent figures, we celebrate Cloris for who she truly was--absolutely FEARLESS.
chinese_title: Fearless, the Life Story of Cloris Leachman
